TopicTitle: Moho appears completely black when the camera is too close to it.

Articles.Content:
[http://gfycat.com/RemorsefulInsignificantBarracuda](http://gfycat.com/RemorsefulInsignificantBarracuda)

As you can probably tell, this makes landing impossible unless I use KER to tell me how far up I am from the actual surface.

Here's my mods:

![kRm9G1K.png](http://i.imgur.com/kRm9G1K.png)

Here's my KSP.log and output\_log

[http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog_1](http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog_1)

[http://www.filedropper.com/ksp](http://www.filedropper.com/ksp)

I'm assuming it has something to do with Distant Object Enhancement or ATM but I'm really not sure, I want to ask here to see if anyone can make sense of the output logs before I start deleting a load of mods.

Thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

EDIT: I've tried removing all my graphics-y mods to see if that would fix it, and it didn't. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

EDIT 2: Kopernicus was causing the issue, reinstalling it fixed it. This can be locked.
